title: Has Rudy Giuliani Been Disbarred?
subtitle: As public anger grew over the violent attack on the U.S. Capitol by Trump supporters, some pointed fingers at the president's personal attorney.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: U.S. President Donald Trump's personal attorney Rudy Giuliani has been disbarred for his role in inciting the attack on the U.S. Capitol by Trump supporters.
